title: Antonym Challenge
description: Find the word that means the OPPOSITE of the given word!

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'ancient'?
questions.explanation: 'Modern' means relating to the present time, making it the opposite of 'ancient,' which refers to something very old.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'bold'?
questions.explanation: 'Timid' means lacking courage or confidence, which is the direct opposite of 'bold.'

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'generous'?
questions.explanation: 'Stingy' means unwilling to give or spend, making it the opposite of 'generous.'

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'humble'?
questions.explanation: 'Arrogant' means having an exaggerated sense of one's own importance, the opposite of being 'humble.'

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'rigid'?
questions.explanation: 'Flexible' means capable of bending easily, which is the direct opposite of 'rigid.'

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'tranquil'?
questions.explanation: 'Chaotic' means in a state of complete disorder, the opposite of the peaceful state described by 'tranquil.'

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'abundant'?
questions.explanation: 'Scarce' means insufficient or in short supply, making it the opposite of 'abundant.'

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'vague'?
questions.explanation: 'Precise' means exact and clearly defined, the opposite of 'vague,' which means unclear or uncertain.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'trivial'?
questions.explanation: 'Significant' means important or noteworthy, which is the opposite of 'trivial,' meaning of little value.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'fragile'?
questions.explanation: 'Sturdy' means strong and well-built, the direct opposite of 'fragile,' which means easily broken.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'expand'?
questions.explanation: 'Contract' means to shrink or become smaller, the opposite of 'expand,' which means to grow larger.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'shallow'?
questions.explanation: 'Profound' means very deep or intense, making it the opposite of 'shallow,' which means lacking depth.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'optimistic'?
questions.explanation: 'Pessimistic' means expecting the worst outcome, the direct opposite of 'optimistic,' which means expecting the best.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'permanent'?
questions.explanation: 'Temporary' means lasting for only a limited time, the opposite of 'permanent,' which means lasting indefinitely.

questions.question: Which word is an antonym for 'artificial'?
questions.explanation: 'Natural' means existing in or derived from nature, the opposite of 'artificial,' which means made by humans.
